changeSet.sql: drop view jam_wiki_user; alter table users alter column lastlogin type timestamp with time zone; alter table users alter column regdate type timestamp with time zone; CREATE VIEW jam_wiki_user AS SELECT users.id AS wiki_user_id, users.nick AS login, users.name AS display_name, users.regdate AS create_date, users.lastlogin AS last_login_date, '127.0.0.1'::character varying(15) AS create_ip_address, '127.0.0.1'::character varying(15) AS last_login_ip_address, 'ru_RU'::character varying(8) AS default_locale, users.email, 'toolbar'::character varying(50) AS editor, ''::character varying(255) AS signature, users.style FROM users;
